image.description: Link to a PNG image that represents connector.

test_auth.description: Link to an endpoint that helps to test backend authorization.

object_types.description: Object types that the connector supports.

actions.description: Connector level (Global level) actions that the connector supports.

config.description: Multi tenant connector config properties that admin will be prompted while configuring Mobile Flows.

anyOf.description: Each additional property is an object type.

doc.description: Link to the schema of the object type.

anyOf.description: Each additional property describes an input field.

pollable.description: A hint for the client that polling for this object_type might produce objects containing new data.

metadata.description: Free form key-value pairs. Can contain additional metadata about the object_type, if anything is required by client.

endpoint.description: Link to an endpoint that produces this object_type.

regex.description: Regular expression that can be used by client to capture valid inputs, from a text line or paragraph.

capture_group.description: Which parentheses group of the regex captured text to be used.

env.description: To be collected from client's Environment variables and send in the request. See Discovery in wiki.

required.description: A flag says if this input field is mandatory. If client knows this field then it can include in the request for better results.

anyOf.description: Each additional property describes about a connector level action

user_input.description: Allows the user to enter data to be submitted in this action.

anyOf.description: Each additional property describes an input field.

label.description: Localised human-readable description of the action. Locale is the key (ex. en-US, en-GB, en-IN, etc.) and the description is the value.

completed_label.description: A localized message that says whether the action was successful. Locale is the key and the message is the value.

type.description: The HTTP method to use for submitting the action request.

action_key.description: A key by which client understand the way to submit the action. See Discovery in wiki

metadata.description: Free form key-value pairs. Can contain additional metadata about the action, if anything is required by client.

id.description: The field's ID, which will be used as the key when this field is submitted.

label.description: Localised field's label, which will be displayed to the user to describe the expected content of the field. Locale is the key and the message is the value.

format.description: The format type of the user input.

select.description: If the format is 'select', choices for selecting should also be specified.

min_length.description: The minimum length of the user entered text field.

max_length.description: The maximum length of the user entered text field.

value.description: This is used as the form value while submitting the action.

label.description: Localised label for the select choice. Locale is the key and the label is the value.

anyOf.description: Each additional property is a connector level configuration.

default.description: A default value in string for the configuration.

label.description: Localised short label for the config field, that will be displayed in the admin dashboard. Locale is the key and the message is the value.

description.description: Localised description for the config field. Locale is the key and the message is the value.

validators.description: Optional array of validators. Admin is allowed to enter a value that validates against each of these.

type.description: Config validator type. See wiki for supported validator types.

description.description: Localised description for the validator. Locale is the key and the message is the value.

value.description: A value that can be associated with some of the validator types. See Wiki for examples.
